text: Park Ji-hyun (born November 26, 1994) is South Korean actress and model. She is best known for her role in the television series Rookie Historian Goo Hae- ryung and in the films Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum and The Divine Fury. ==Biography and career== Park Ji-hyun studied at Hankuk University of Foreign Studies. She joined the agency Namoo Actors in 2016. She made her debut as an actress in 2017. Nominated for the Rookie of the Year Award at the 39th Blue Dragon Film Awards in 2018 and at the 24th Spring Festival in 2019, she has taken on several memorable roles in both films and television dramas, since her debut, including those in Your Honor and The Divine Fury. ==Filmography== ===Television series=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
